translation.en: [narrator] Somewhere in the Pacific, an exciting island beckons.
translation.zh: 太平洋某处 一座令人兴奋的小岛在召唤

translation.en: [narrator] Welcome to the island of Cebu.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到宿务岛

translation.en: -[dance music playing] -[crowd cheering]
translation.zh: （菲律宾 宿务省）

translation.en: [female singers] ♪ I love Cebu ♪
translation.zh: 我爱宿务

translation.en: ♪ I love Cebu ♪
translation.zh: 我爱宿务

translation.en: Madam Speaker, I rise today...
translation.zh: 议长女士 （宿务第三区议员 葛温多立加西亚） 我今天站在这里

translation.en: on a matter concerning the great province of Cebu:
translation.zh: 是为了一件有关宿务省的议事

translation.en: the sad and sorry state
translation.zh: 宿务省劳教看守所

translation.en: of the Cebu Provincial Detention and Rehabilitation Center.
translation.zh: 目前可悲又可怜的状态

translation.en: Allow me to refresh your memories of the CPDRC experience.
translation.zh: 请允许我 再次重复一遍 宿务省劳教看守所的经历

translation.en: [Gwendolyn] Under my watch as governor,
translation.zh: 在我做省长的期间

translation.en: the Cebu Provincial Detention and Rehabilitation Center
translation.zh: 宿务省劳教看守所

translation.en: -became a world-class facility. -[inmates clamoring]
translation.zh: 成为了世界级劳教场所

translation.en: [Gwendolyn] After their performance of Michael Jackson's "Thriller"
translation.zh: 狱友们所表演的 迈克杰克逊之歌《颤栗者》

translation.en: -on YouTube in 2007, -["Thriller" playing]
translation.zh: 2007年登陆视频网站后

translation.en: our inmates became famous as Cebu's Dancing Inmates.
translation.zh: 他们成为了宿务省著名的舞蹈狱友

translation.en: [Gwendolyn] A source of collective pride for our people.
translation.zh: 他们 是我们所有人的骄傲之本

translation.en: But more than the pride it brought the Philippines,
translation.zh: 但相比起这带给菲律宾的荣耀来说

translation.en: it is what the experience meant to each inmate that truly mattered.
translation.zh: 这种经历对于每个狱友的意义 才是真正重要的

translation.en: -Because it meant redemption. -[man shouting directions over PA]
translation.zh: 因为这意味着救赎

translation.en: [Gwendolyn] Here we are, nine years after the CPDRC
translation.zh: 现在 宿务省劳教看守所 一举成名的九年后

translation.en: -shot to global fame. -[man continues shouting on PA]
translation.zh: 一举成名的九年后

translation.en: [Gwendolyn] Much has changed since Hilario Davide III became governor
translation.zh: 自从希拉里奥大卫德三世成为省长 然后任命 马科托罗成为监狱管理顾问后

translation.en: and appointed Marco Toral consultant on jail management.
translation.zh: 一切都发生了极大的变化

translation.en: [Gwendolyn] Marco Toral is an ex-convict out on appeal.
translation.zh: 马科托罗 是通过上诉出狱的前科罪犯

translation.en: Davide's justification was that he has experience.
translation.zh: 大卫德的辩解是他对此有经验

translation.en: -[dramatic instrumental music playing] -Seriously?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: How quickly we have descended from a real-life Jailhouse Rock
translation.zh: 我们已经快速地 从真实版《监狱摇滚》

translation.en: -to hitting rock bottom. -[paddle thuds]
translation.zh: 跌至谷底

translation.en: [Gwendolyn] How has it come to this?
translation.zh: 这一切是怎么发生的？

translation.en: -["Lupang Hinirang" playing on PA] -[in Tagalog] ♪ Land of the morning ♪
translation.zh: 司晨的大地

translation.en: ♪ Child of the sun returning ♪
translation.zh: 太阳的后裔

translation.en: ♪ With fervor burning Thee do our souls adore ♪
translation.zh: 让我们一同热情地歌颂你

translation.en: ♪ Land dear and holy Cradle of noble heroes ♪
translation.zh: 神圣的土地 英雄的摇篮

translation.en: ♪ Ne'er shall invaders Trample thy sacred shores ♪
translation.zh: 对于那侵略者 你永远不屈服 （无信仰者）

translation.en: ♪ Ever within thy skies And through thy clouds... ♪
translation.zh: 穿越高山与大海 （马科托罗 宿务省劳教看守所监狱管理顾问）

translation.en: [in English] My name is Marco Toral.
translation.zh: 我叫马科托罗

translation.en: -Hey! -[man shouts indistinctly]
translation.zh: -嘿 -嗨

translation.en: [Toral] Good morning!
translation.zh: 早上好

translation.en: And I'm the consultant for, um, jail management
translation.zh: 我是宿务省劳教看守所的

translation.en: at the Cebu Provincial Detention and Rehabilitation Center.
translation.zh: 监狱管理顾问

translation.en: Yes, it is only in this jail that you see the tower shorter
translation.zh: 没错 只有这个监狱 你会看到塔楼比围墙更低

translation.en: -than the-- the fence. -[chicken clucking]
translation.zh: 你会看到塔楼比围墙更低

translation.en: Usually, it's on top of the fence, right?
translation.zh: 通常塔楼是在围墙上面的 对吗？ 所以这个

translation.en: Though this one is, like, shorter than the fence.
translation.zh: 通常塔楼是在围墙上面的 对吗？ 所以这个 要比围墙更矮

translation.en: [Toral] You know, I was an inmate myself, and I-- I became a consultant for the inmates.
translation.zh: 我曾经也是狱友 我后来成为了监狱顾问

translation.en: [in Cebuano] Just your picture!
translation.zh: 你想象一下

translation.en: [in English] The first thing in my mind was to help the inmates.
translation.zh: 我脑海里首要的事是帮助狱友

translation.en: You-- You can never take care of them if you don't know what you're doing.
translation.zh: 如果你不知道自己在做什么 你就永远无法照顾他们

translation.en: You know, like, if you haven't been to jail,
translation.zh: 如果你从没进过监狱

translation.en: you're not gonna do even one-- one percent of what I'm doing.
translation.zh: 你就完全无法做我现在做的事情

translation.en: That's what my philosophy is.
translation.zh: 这就是我是哲理

translation.en: Like, you can't guard a jail if you're not an inmate.
translation.zh: 如果你没进过监狱 你就无法守护这里

translation.en: -[gate rattles] -That's my sniffing dog over there.
translation.zh: 我的搜查犬在那边

translation.en: -[barking, whines] -[Toral] It's a Dutch Shepherd.
translation.zh: 它是只荷兰牧羊犬

translation.en: [Toral] To be able to understand, you know, the inmates,
translation.zh: 为了了解狱友

translation.en: you have to be hands-on.
translation.zh: 你必须要亲自实践

translation.en: So, this is Tony. He's, um... a welder.
translation.zh: 这位是托尼 他是焊工

translation.en: He's making a trailer right now. Yeah.
translation.zh: 他现在在做拖车

translation.en: But you're happy.
translation.zh: 你挺满意吧

translation.en: [in Cebuano] I'm happy.
translation.zh: 我挺满意的

translation.en: [Toral, in English] We're trying our very best to, uh, uplift the inmates.
translation.zh: 我们在尽最大努力鼓励狱友们

translation.en: [Toral] We don't look at jail as, you know, something bad.
translation.zh: 我们并不认为监狱是坏事

translation.en: So why don't we make it like a... happy jail for happy inmates?
translation.zh: 所以为何不把这里变成… 开心狱友的安乐监狱呢？

translation.en: [man over PA, in Cebuano] I'll repeat it for the last time. Where are the dancers for "Summertime"?
translation.zh: 我再重复最后一次 《夏日时光》的舞蹈者都在哪里？

translation.en: [in English] I'm the original choreographer
translation.zh: 我是《颤栗者》舞蹈秀的编舞

translation.en: of the "Thriller."
translation.zh: 我是《颤栗者》舞蹈秀的编舞 （文森洛萨雷斯 编舞）

translation.en: It may be inborn for me to dance.
translation.zh: 跳舞对我来说是与生俱来的

translation.en: Because three years old, I'm dancing, and elementary, I'm dancing.
translation.zh: 因为我三岁的时候就在跳舞 小学的时候在跳舞

translation.en: And high school, maybe one year in high school, I dance.
translation.zh: 高中的其中一年 我在跳舞

translation.en: Now I'm proud to be a professional choreographer.
translation.zh: 现在我很骄傲成为了专业编舞

translation.en: This is my passion. This is my path.
translation.zh: 这是我的兴趣 是我人生的道路

translation.en: So maybe it's God's will.
translation.zh: 所以应该是上帝的旨意吧

translation.en: [Rosales] Before I start here, I'm so very scared.
translation.zh: 在我来这里之前 我非常的害怕

translation.en: One thousand five hundred inmates!
translation.zh: 有1500个狱友！

translation.en: They throw slippers at me.
translation.zh: 他们冲我扔拖鞋

translation.en: They say, "Fuck you."
translation.zh: 他们说：“操你妈的！”

translation.en: Months after, the inmates in their cells are practicing
translation.zh: 几个月后 这些狱友在自己的房间里 每天早上练习跳舞

translation.en: in the morning. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 每天早上练习跳舞

translation.en: [Rosales] They're happy, and they're dancing anywhere--
translation.zh: 他们很开心 到处跳舞

translation.en: in the cell, in the quadrangle.
translation.zh: 在牢狱房间里 在院子里

translation.en: -[speaking Cebuano] -[Rosales chuckles] They love it so.
translation.zh: 他们很爱跳舞

translation.en: -Wow. -[inmate] Wow!
translation.zh: -哇 -哇

translation.en: [man over PA] Welcome to the new Cebu Provincial Detention and Rehabilitation Center,
translation.zh: 欢迎来到新的宿务省劳教看守所

translation.en: the home of the world-famous Dancing Inmates.
translation.zh: 世界知名跳舞狱友之家

translation.en: Hi. Good afternoon. This way. This way. Okay?
translation.zh: 下午好 这边请

translation.en: Visitors are now coming from other countries
translation.zh: 来自其他国家的访客来到这里

translation.en: to see the, uh, monthly performance for the-- open to the public.
translation.zh: 来自其他国家的访客来到这里 观看向公众开放的月度表演

translation.en: Thank you for coming. Come again. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 谢谢你们前来 请再来

translation.en: Dancing Inmates! Yeah.
translation.zh: 跳舞狱友！耶！

translation.en: -[Rosales] Play! -["Conga" plays]
translation.zh: 播放！

translation.en: My name is Marlon Maloloyon, 24, from Cordova, Cebu.
translation.zh: 我叫马龙马罗永 24岁 来自宿务的科尔多瓦

translation.en: I started to dance and I 14 years old at home.
translation.zh: 我14岁时就在家开始跳舞

translation.en: I am the lead dancer in here.
translation.zh: 我是这里的领舞者

translation.en: The Dancing Inmates...
translation.zh: 跳舞狱友

translation.en: I see them on YouTube.
translation.zh: 我在视频网上看过

translation.en: -We're known worldwide. -["Thriller" playing]
translation.zh: 我们全球知名

translation.en: Oh. Then it happened! [laughs]
translation.zh: （马龙马罗永 狱友） 然后就实现了！

translation.en: [Maloloyon, in English] I'm a licensed massage therapist...
translation.zh: 我曾经是职业按摩师

translation.en: in outside.
translation.zh: 在狱外

translation.en: But now... I'm a licensed prisoner. [laughs]
translation.zh: 但现在 我是职业狱友

translation.en: Licensed prisoner. [chuckles, sighs]
translation.zh: 职业狱友

translation.en: [Maloloyon] When you go to other jail, you can't see dancing. Only here.
translation.zh: 在其他监狱里 你是不会看到有人跳舞的 只有这里

translation.en: [Maloloyon] I see happy people face when... when they watch us dancing.
translation.zh: 人们看到我们跳舞时 他们会露出开心的面容

translation.en: We give happiness to them.
translation.zh: 我们给他们带去幸福

translation.en: [man over PA] Okay, let's give them a round of applause!
translation.zh: 好了 我们要这样跳！

translation.en: [Maloloyon] Sometimes, I feel-- It feels like,
translation.zh: 有时候我感觉

translation.en: "Wow. We're celebrity." [chuckles]
translation.zh: “哇 我们是名人了”

translation.en: Yeah, but just for a while.
translation.zh: 是的 但只是一瞬间而已

translation.en: [man over PA, in Cebuano] Good morning, fellow inmates!
translation.zh: 早上好 狱友们

translation.en: -[Toral, in English] Just stay here. Stay. -What? What? What?
translation.zh: 别动 什么？

translation.en: -No, no! The warden is not here! -[all laugh]
translation.zh: 别动 狱长不在这里

translation.en: [Manansala] My job here is to oversee the daily operation of the center.
translation.zh: 我的工作就是监管看守所的日常运行

translation.en: I've been in this job for 34 years. Yeah.
translation.zh: 这个工作我已经干了34年 是啊

translation.en: It's a big job. Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 这是份重大工作

translation.en: There is a lot of changes since Marco took over.
translation.zh: 自从马科接手后 这里变化很大

translation.en: The governor trusts him.
translation.zh: 省长信任他

translation.en: The governor have lots of confidence in Marco.
translation.zh: 省长对马科先生很有信心

translation.en: -[upbeat music playing] -[male singers] ♪ Junjun, Junjun ♪
translation.zh: 俊俊 俊俊

translation.en: ♪ This is Junjun ♪
translation.zh: 这位是俊俊

translation.en: [announcer, in Cebuano] Junjun Davide for governor.
translation.zh: 俊俊大卫德 竞选省长

translation.en: [Toral, in English] Governor's wife was my classmate, so he's my good friend.
translation.zh: 省长的妻子曾和我是同学 所以他是我的好友

translation.en: Uh, when I got out of jail, I was in the campaign,
translation.zh: 我出狱后 我帮助他做省长竞选

translation.en: you know, campaigning for Gov,
translation.zh: 我帮助他做省长竞选

translation.en: and when the campaign was over, and we knew Junjun was gonna win,
translation.zh: 竞选结束后 我们知道俊俊会赢

translation.en: he told me, "Hey, Marc. I'm gonna-- I'm gonna hire you."
translation.zh: 他告诉我：“马科 我要雇佣你”

translation.en: I said, "What?"
translation.zh: 我说：“什么？”

translation.en: "So you're the guy who came from prison. You take over the provincial jail."
translation.zh: “你坐过监狱 所以你去管辖省监狱”

translation.en: I told Gov, "I have a very, very colorful past,
translation.zh: 我告诉他：“我的过去有很多历史

translation.en: but whatever you want me to do, I'm gonna do it."
translation.zh: 但不管你让我做什么 我都会做”

translation.en: I-- I think Governor is very-- a brilliant guy.
translation.zh: 我认为省长是很棒的一个人

translation.en: -[whooshing sound effect plays] -Congresswoman...
translation.zh: 议员女士

translation.en: -Call me Gwen. -Gwen Garcia.
translation.zh: -叫我葛温就好 -葛温加西亚

translation.en: A lot of people wonder, in fact, wish for you to...
translation.zh: 很多人想知道 他们其实希望你能再次竞选省长

translation.en: to run again for governor.
translation.zh: 他们其实希望你能再次竞选省长

translation.en: A lot of people miss those nine years when Cebu was, uh, fabulous.
translation.zh: 很多人怀念你在任的那九年里 宿务省的风光岁月

translation.en: If you were to rate the incumbent Governor Davide
translation.zh: 如果你要给现任省长大卫德评分

translation.en: on a scale of one to ten...
translation.zh: 从一分到十分的话…

translation.en: -It would have to be a three. -Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: -只能给三分 -天呐！

translation.en: [Gwendolyn] You know, you have a governor insisting that he's doing the right thing,
translation.zh: 这位省长一直坚称自己在做正确的事

translation.en: but why would you hire an ex-convict? He was out on appeal.
translation.zh: 但为什么要雇佣前科罪犯？ 他是上诉出狱的

translation.en: He was supposed to serve a life sentence, even.
translation.zh: 他本应该终生监禁的

translation.en: The CDPRC has become a source of shame.
translation.zh: 宿务省劳教看守所成为了耻辱

translation.en: This is under the supervision of the governor.
translation.zh: 这都是在现任省长的监管下发生的

translation.en: It has never happened under my watch.
translation.zh: 我在任的时候从没有过

translation.en: I see my fellow Cebuanos, and, you know, they come to me.
translation.zh: 我见到宿务省的人民 他们来找我

translation.en: They crying, and they say,
translation.zh: 他们哭着说：“拜托！

translation.en: "Please, please! Please go back to being governor."
translation.zh: 他们哭着说：“拜托！ 请回来做省长吧”

translation.en: [Toral] I handle Inmate Welfare Development Program.
translation.zh: 我负责狱友福利发展项目

translation.en: I take care of what the inmates need.
translation.zh: 我掌管狱友们的需求

translation.en: Like their cases, what we can do with their cases.
translation.zh: 比如帮助他们的案件

translation.en: Like, if they had a problem,
translation.zh: 比如 如果他们遇到问题

translation.en: they come up to me and tell me about their problem.
translation.zh: 他们来找我 告诉我他们的问题

translation.en: Usually, their problem is about their wife leaving them
translation.zh: 通常都是他们的妻子离开了他们

translation.en: or not visiting them.
translation.zh: 或者不来看他们

translation.en: For those things, you know, it's hard.
translation.zh: 这些事情很难处理

translation.en: So I help them with the boredom or the hopelessness they-- they feel inside.
translation.zh: 所以我帮助他们 解决他们心中的烦闷和无助

translation.en: You don't treat them like animals, you know...
translation.zh: 你不能像对待动物一样对待他们

translation.en: being inside those cells.
translation.zh: 在这些牢狱里

translation.en: On our first day of work, they were telling us
translation.zh: 我们第一天工作时 他们告诉我们

translation.en: that there were lots of monkey business inside the jail.
translation.zh: 监狱里有很多胡闹把戏

translation.en: So I told them, "We're gonna put a table in front of the quadrangle.
translation.zh: 于是我说 “好 我们在院子里放张桌子

translation.en: Surrender all deadly weapons you have inside."
translation.zh: 把你们狱里的致命武器都交出来”

translation.en: So that's what they did.
translation.zh: 于是他们照做了

translation.en: We had lots of deadly weapons, like those sticks, knives--
translation.zh: 我们收到很多致命武器 比如棍子 刀 这些长刀

translation.en: the long knives and knives made out of bone.
translation.zh: 刀 这些长刀 用骨头做成的刀

translation.en: Everybody surrendered their deadly weapon.
translation.zh: 大家都把致命武器交出来了

translation.en: They were asking, "What the fuck?
translation.zh: 他们问：“怎么搞的？

translation.en: How does this guy know we have deadly weapon inside?"
translation.zh: 这家伙怎么会知道我们有武器？”

translation.en: So, don't ask me.
translation.zh: 不用问我

translation.en: And then I said,
translation.zh: 然后我说

translation.en: "I came from jail. Yeah. We're the same."
translation.zh: “我也来自监狱 是的 我们都是一样的”

translation.en: And then I showed them my gang tattoo.
translation.zh: 然后我给他们看了我的帮派纹身

translation.en: Yeah. You don't get a tattoo like this just anywhere.
translation.zh: 这种纹身不是随便纹的

translation.en: You get that tattoo when you're inside.
translation.zh: 只有进过监狱才会纹

translation.en: And we're all like brothers inside, yeah.
translation.zh: 我们在狱里都像兄弟一样

translation.en: Yeah, so that's when we started working.
translation.zh: 所以我们就是这样开始工作的

translation.en: Most of our inmates are detainees. They're not actually prisoners.
translation.zh: 大部分狱友都是拘留犯 并不是真正的牢犯

translation.en: Their cases are being heard in court.
translation.zh: 他们的案件还在法院判决中

translation.en: [Toral] At CPDRC, everyone's innocent until they get convicted.
translation.zh: 在宿务省劳教看守所 在被判刑之前 所有人都是清白的

translation.en: All inmates who get convicted of their crime...
translation.zh: 所有被判刑的狱友

translation.en: are sent to the maximum-security prison in Muntinlupa.
translation.zh: 都会被押送至 文珍俞巴市的最高警戒监狱

translation.en: [Toral] We got lots of overstaying inmates, like, 14 years inside...
translation.zh: 我们这里有很多逾期滞留的狱友 在里面呆了14年

translation.en: and the maximum they have for their crime is, like, four years only.
translation.zh: 而他们犯罪的最大刑罚只有四年

translation.en: Unless they get convicted, they're still with us.
translation.zh: 直到被定罪前 他们只能待在这里

translation.en: [Toral] Yeah, the female inmates have their own section of the jail.
translation.zh: 女性狱友有自己的牢房

translation.en: We are all only 36 female inmates in 2007.
translation.zh: 2007年我们有36个女性狱友 （艾弗琳埃辛瓜 “波西亚” 女狱友长）

translation.en: In 2014, 100 female inmates.
translation.zh: 2014年 有一百位女性狱友

translation.en: [Toral] And now there's, like, 200 of them in, like, six cells.
translation.zh: 现在 六间牢房里有二百位

translation.en: Oh, man, it's overcrowded.
translation.zh: 天呐 人太多了

translation.en: When we have a new inmates girl...
translation.zh: 我们接到新的女性狱友

translation.en: [in Cebuano] ...they are not allowed to leave their cells for one month.
translation.zh: 会把她们关进去一个月

translation.en: After one month, I ask them, "What do you remember of our rules?”
translation.zh: 一个月后 我问她们 “是否记得我们的规定？”

translation.en: If they are able to recall them, then they are already allowed to go out.
translation.zh: 如果她们能背下来 就可以出去

translation.en: If not, they can't go outside.
translation.zh: 如果不能背下来 就不能出去

translation.en: If you let them be badass, there will be trouble.
translation.zh: 如果你放任她们不管 就会有麻烦

translation.en: -But everyone is disciplined. It's nice. -[women laugh]
translation.zh: 但这里大家都很守规定 所以没事

translation.en: Now, we don't feel like we are prisoners.
translation.zh: 我们感觉自己并不像是牢犯

translation.en: [Toral, in English] Dancing Inmates was started by the previous administration.
translation.zh: 跳舞狱友 是由前任管理者开创的

translation.en: But I found it that it was a good exercise for everybody, and it was fun.
translation.zh: 我觉得这是让所有人锻炼的好办法 而且很有趣

translation.en: So, you know, we continued it in our time.
translation.zh: 所以我们就延续了下来

translation.en: Vince is being detailed to our jail to teach them dancing. That's his job.
translation.zh: （文森 编舞） 文森被派到我们监狱 教大家跳舞 这是他的工作

translation.en: [man 1] Five, six, seven, start!
translation.zh: 五、六、七、八

translation.en: One, two,
translation.zh: 一、二

translation.en: three, four, five, six, seven, eight.
translation.zh: 三、四、五、六、七、八

translation.en: [Rosales] From the top.
translation.zh: 从头开始

translation.en: [in Cebuano] You guys sit.
translation.zh: 你们坐下

translation.en: -Stand up! -[man] Why did you take a seat?
translation.zh: -站起来 -你为什么坐下？

translation.en: -[inmates cheer] -[Rosales] Stand up!
translation.zh: 站起来

translation.en: [Rosales, in English] Play.
translation.zh: 播放

translation.en: [Rosales, in Cebuano] They will be the new lead dancers.
translation.zh: 他们会成为新的领舞者

translation.en: [Rosales] How many days has it been?
translation.zh: 已经多少天了？

translation.en: Two days? What?
translation.zh: 两天吗？

translation.en: Still coming down, sir?
translation.zh: 还没恢复吗？

translation.en: -[inmates laugh] -[laughs] Still high!
translation.zh: 还是很嗨！

translation.en: This, buddy, is not to embarrass you.
translation.zh: 这并不是为了让你丢脸

translation.en: You'll learn. It's so that you'll learn 'cause it is really difficult.
translation.zh: 你会学习 这样是为了让你学习 因为真的很难

translation.en: This is the CPDRC's only defense: dancing.
translation.zh: 跳舞是宿务省劳教看守所唯一的防范

translation.en: If dancing stops here, we're better off going to sleep.
translation.zh: 如果不再跳舞了 我们不如去睡觉

translation.en: [man 1, in English] Welcome to the grocery department.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到百货店

translation.en: [man 2 laughs] Grocery department.
translation.zh: 百货店

translation.en: You see here, we have chocolates... sugar, salt,
translation.zh: 这里有巧克力 糖和盐

translation.en: juices, noodles, shampoo, and...
translation.zh: 果汁 面条 洗发水 还有…

translation.en: homemade banana chips.
translation.zh: 手工做的香蕉片

translation.en: -[lighter clicks] -Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -[electricity crackles] -[man 2] Oh, brown out. [laughs]
translation.zh: 要停电了

translation.en: [Toral] Today is our family day.
translation.zh: 今天是家庭探访日

translation.en: A lot of our inmates, um, get their visitors today.
translation.zh: 我们很多狱友会有家人探访

translation.en: We're expecting about 400 visitors who are staying overnight until tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我们会迎接大约… 四百位访客 他们会在这过夜

translation.en: They sleep on the quadrangle with their sleeping bags and everything.
translation.zh: 他们睡在院子里 睡在睡袋里之类的 就像宿营

translation.en: It's like camping.
translation.zh: 睡在睡袋里之类的 就像宿营

translation.en: [woman, in Cebuano] What is this? Just soap and toothpaste, sir.
translation.zh: -这是什么？ -香皂和牙膏而已

translation.en: Just leave it with the guard and just get it back later.
translation.zh: 放在警卫那里 之后再取回来

translation.en: [in English] Before my time, they were strict about the dalaw.
translation.zh: 我来之前 他们对“达唠”要求很严

translation.en: They were-- They didn't allow stay-in.
translation.zh: 他们不允许过夜

translation.en: I wrote a letter to Governor
translation.zh: 我写信给省长 向他保证

translation.en: with an agreement that nothing bad will happen.
translation.zh: 我写信给省长 向他保证 不会有事的 大家都守规矩

translation.en: Like, everybody behave. Yeah, so that's what we did.
translation.zh: 不会有事的 大家都守规矩 是的 所以成了这样

translation.en: Dalaw became regular every week, and they were happy.
translation.zh: “达唠日”变成了每周的常规 他们很开心

translation.en: [man speaking over PA, in Cebuano] Attention to all visitors!
translation.zh: 所有探访人注意

translation.en: Attention to all visitors!
translation.zh: 所有探访人注意

translation.en: [Toral, in English] I had the power to change it, so I did it.
translation.zh: 我有权力改变这一点 于是我就改变了

translation.en: [Asingua] The dalaw can get inside in our cell.
translation.zh: “达唠”可以进入到牢房里

translation.en: We can bonding. Mm.
translation.zh: 我们可以增进感情

translation.en: That is the number one as a prisoners--
translation.zh: 这是最重要的 作为牢犯 能和家人增进感情

translation.en: that bonding of our family, our children.
translation.zh: 作为牢犯 能和家人增进感情 和孩子们增进感情

translation.en: We are so happy.
translation.zh: 我们很开心

translation.en: We are family here inside... because of our consultant.
translation.zh: 因为我们的顾问 我们能在这里见到家人

translation.en: [Maloloyon, in Cebuano] I see families talking with their children outside.
translation.zh: 我在外面看到家人和孩子们交谈

translation.en: As I watch them...
translation.zh: 我看着他们

translation.en: I think of my family. [clicks tongue]
translation.zh: 会想起我的家人 （马龙马罗永 狱友）

translation.en: Too bad they're not here.
translation.zh: 可惜他们不在这里

translation.en: [man, in English] Before, I am a inmate during the Garcia administration.
translation.zh: 我是加西亚政府时期的狱犯

translation.en: Before I was guarded. Now I am the guard. [chuckles] Yeah.
translation.zh: （提米卢塞纳思 警卫 前狱友） 之前我被看守 我现在是警卫 是啊

translation.en: So many inmates don't have, uh, visitors.
translation.zh: 很多狱友没有亲友探访

translation.en: I feel jealous of my co-inmates before.
translation.zh: 我以前很嫉妒我的狱友

translation.en: That the other inmates have dalaw, their loved ones.
translation.zh: 其他狱友都有“达唠” 他们的爱人

translation.en: They can even hug. They can kiss their children.
translation.zh: 他们拥抱 亲吻孩子们

translation.en: But me? I stay from far.
translation.zh: 但我呢？我只能呆在远处

translation.en: And, uh, financial needs-- that is the big problem.
translation.zh: 还有财务需求 也是大问题

translation.en: [Toral] Sometimes when I see inmates, no money, no dalaw, uh...
translation.zh: 有时候 我看到一些狱友 没有钱 没有“达唠”

translation.en: I give them 100 pesos just to have them buy food.
translation.zh: 我会给他们一百比索 帮他们买食物

translation.en: You see their faces, like, just light... light up.
translation.zh: 你看到他们的脸一下子开心起来

translation.en: [Lucernas] Sir Marco...
translation.zh: 马科先生

translation.en: Very nice person.
translation.zh: 是好人

translation.en: Since he's arrive, we get very happy.
translation.zh: 他来之后 我们很开心

translation.en: [Asingua] Before, the other warden and the consultant...
translation.zh: 那之前 另一个狱长和顾问

translation.en: [chuckles] ...very bad.
translation.zh: 他们很坏

translation.en: We don't want to go back at that situation.
translation.zh: 我们不想再回到 那种境况

translation.en: [in Cebuano] Jails are expected to be more congested with inmates
translation.zh: 由于近期政府加强了反毒品活动

translation.en: due to the recently intensified government antidrug campaign.
translation.zh: 监狱将迎来更多的狱犯

translation.en: [man, in English] Every entry,
translation.zh: 每次进来的人

translation.en: 80 percents are, you know, charged with drugs.
translation.zh: 百分之八十都是因为毒品

translation.en: You wanna bet?
translation.zh: 你想打赌吗？

translation.en: I will ask them what's the crime. Yeah. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我可以问他们的罪行 （马克阿隆 副狱长）

translation.en: Drugs! Murder. His is drugs and murder.
translation.zh: 毒品！ 谋杀 他是因为毒品和谋杀

translation.en: Every time there's a remand, it's always drugs.
translation.zh: 每次有还押人员 都是因为毒品

translation.en: My campaign against drug will not stop...
translation.zh: 我对毒品的抗争 （杜特尔特 菲律宾总统） 不会结束

translation.en: -[people shouting] -...until the end of my term.
translation.zh: 直到我卸任为止

translation.en: Until the last pusher and the last drug lord...
translation.zh: 直到最后一个毒贩 最后一个毒枭

translation.en: -are... [makes choking noise] -[audience cheers]
translation.zh: 都被…

translation.en: You hear the news? Yeah.
translation.zh: 你听新闻了吗？是啊

translation.en: If you are a drug lord and you will not stop,
translation.zh: 如果你是毒贩 还不准备收手

translation.en: they will be killed.
translation.zh: 那就会被杀掉

translation.en: Plain and simple-- kill them all.
translation.zh: 很简单明了 杀死所有毒贩

translation.en: I went into prison because I committed a certain crime.
translation.zh: 我进监狱是因为某个罪行

translation.en: But that doesn't mean that I am a very bad man.
translation.zh: 但这并不意味着我是很坏的人

translation.en: Why? Because they thought I was, uh, selling drugs.
translation.zh: 为什么？因为他们认为我卖毒品

translation.en: Which... I don't.
translation.zh: 而我没有

translation.en: I use. I don't deny I use.
translation.zh: 我吸毒 我不否认这一点

translation.en: You might say, uh...
translation.zh: 你可以说

translation.en: I'm use-- I'm just using because, you know, I'm so lonely.
translation.zh: 我吸毒 因为我很孤单

translation.en: I need somebody. I needed a wife.
translation.zh: 我需要别人 我需要个妻子

translation.en: My children are all gone.
translation.zh: 我的孩子们都走了

translation.en: -[speaking Cebuano] -[Montemayor] So I miss them.
translation.zh: 我想念他们

translation.en: Dragon tattoo.
translation.zh: 龙纹身

translation.en: And this one, also.
translation.zh: 还有这个

translation.en: Although I know it's wrong, but, uh, it makes me happy.
translation.zh: 虽然我知道这样不对 但这让我开心

translation.en: No matter what's the consequence.
translation.zh: 不论结果如何

translation.en: [in Cebuano] Lift it up a bit, Teodorico. Step back a bit.
translation.zh: 里克 抬高一点 向后退一些

translation.en: [Montemayor, in English] The first time I got caught happened in 1979.
translation.zh: 我第一次被抓是在1979年

translation.en: -[shutter clicks] -I got out 2010.
translation.zh: 我在2010年 出狱了

translation.en: Now it's 2016.
translation.zh: 现在是2016年

translation.en: Well, at least I enjoyed five years outside.
translation.zh: 至少我在外面享受了五年时光

translation.en: [Montemayor] When I got caught, although I felt apprehensive at first,
translation.zh: 我被抓时 虽然一开始有些不安

translation.en: it's kind of an adventure for me.
translation.zh: 这对我就像是一种探险

translation.en: [Montemayor] I thought it was fun inside the prison.
translation.zh: 我认为监狱里面还挺有趣的

translation.en: [Montemayor] But it was a different thing.
translation.zh: 但这是不一样的

translation.en: I didn't realize how hard it could get there.
translation.zh: 我没有意识到 会有多艰难

translation.en: So, at a very young age, I discovered...
translation.zh: 在很年轻的时候 我就知道…

translation.en: what it is to pay for your crime.
translation.zh: 你要为自己的罪行付出多少

translation.en: [Toral] Answer me in English. You're gonna shoot me?
translation.zh: 用英语回答我 你要打我吗？

translation.en: He's crazy. He's a new-- new-- new guard.
translation.zh: 他疯了 他是新的警卫

translation.en: His name is Miranda.
translation.zh: 他叫米兰达

translation.en: "You have the right to remain silent.
translation.zh: “你有权保持沉默

translation.en: Anything you say or do shall be taken upon you.
translation.zh: 你所作的任何言行都作为承堂证供

translation.en: If you cannot afford a lawyer, the state will provide you."
translation.zh: 如果你无法承担律师 政府会为你提供律师” 这类的话 对吗？

translation.en: Like, something like that, right? Tell them about your training.
translation.zh: 政府会为你提供律师” 这类的话 对吗？ 跟他们说说你的培训

translation.en: This guy doesn't know how to swim. So I asked them during their final rites,
translation.zh: 这家伙不会游泳 于是在他们最后的培训仪式中 我问他们：“你们会游泳吗？”

translation.en: um, "Do you know how to swim?" He said, "No, I don't know how to swim."
translation.zh: 于是在他们最后的培训仪式中 我问他们：“你们会游泳吗？” 他说：“不 我不会游泳”

translation.en: So, they were all blindfolded, so I pushed him onto the pool,
translation.zh: 他们都戴着眼罩 于是我把他推进泳池 他很惊慌

translation.en: and he was like, "Oh, shit! What am I gonna do?" [chuckles]
translation.zh: 他们都戴着眼罩 于是我把他推进泳池 他很惊慌 “我该怎么办？” 是 很有意思的家伙

translation.en: Very funny guy.
translation.zh: 是 很有意思的家伙

translation.en: He learned that day how to swim.
translation.zh: 他那天学会了游泳

translation.en: So we have a very good cooperation with bosyo, with Lito.
translation.zh: 我们和利托合作很好 他也就是“波西奥”

translation.en: He's been here for 15 years.
translation.zh: 他在这里15年了

translation.en: [in Cebuano] Minaria, you need to watch there too!
translation.zh: “米尼利亚” 你也要看着那边 别光站在那里！

translation.en: -Don't just stand there! -[shouting in Cebuano]
translation.zh: “米尼利亚” 你也要看着那边 别光站在那里！ （利托冠纳达 “波西奥” 狱友长）

translation.en: Watch the lines. Reprimand them! Don't just stand there.
translation.zh: 注意队形 斥责他们 别光站在那里！

translation.en: Do you want to dance?
translation.zh: 你想跳舞吗？

translation.en: [Toral, in English] The inmates have their own government inside.
translation.zh: 狱友们有自己的政府

translation.en: They have their own police. You know, the minaria.
translation.zh: 他们有自己的警察 你知道“米尼利亚” 吧？

translation.en: Lito... he started as a capo minaria.
translation.zh: 利托 他一开始就是“米尼利亚”

translation.en: The watchmen.
translation.zh: 看守人

translation.en: The inmates' police.
translation.zh: 狱友警察

translation.en: And after a few months, he was elected leader.
translation.zh: 几个月后 他被选为狱友长

translation.en: He was, like, the president of the BC45 gang in CPDRC.
translation.zh: 他就像是宿务省劳教看守所 BC45帮派的领袖

translation.en: [Maloloyon] Here, we are one gang. There are no other gang.
translation.zh: 在这里 我们是一个帮派 没有其他帮派

translation.en: We are BC45 all, so that's why...
translation.zh: 我们都是BC45帮派

translation.en: no fighting happen in here.
translation.zh: 所以这里不会打架

translation.en: -[tattoo machine buzzes] -[Maloloyan] Because we are one.
translation.zh: 因为我们都是同一方

translation.en: We are BC.
translation.zh: 我们是BC

translation.en: [Montemayor] Batang Cebu.
translation.zh: 也就是宿务帮派

translation.en: If I'm going to translate it,
translation.zh: 它的意思是

translation.en: "Children of Cebu," "Men of Cebu," "Boys of Cebu."
translation.zh: “宿务之子” “宿务男人”

translation.en: All of the members are criminals.
translation.zh: 所有成员都是罪犯

translation.en: The jails is our home.
translation.zh: 监狱是我们的家

translation.en: [Maloloyon] Commander Lito, like, he teach you the policy in here,
translation.zh: 利托长官 他会教你这里的法则

translation.en: what you are gonna do, what is the rules.
translation.zh: 你该做什么 规则是什么

translation.en: Like Ten Commandments. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 就像是十诫

translation.en: And we call it "Magnakarta."
translation.zh: 我们称之为“大宪章”

translation.en: It teaches what is not allowed in center.
translation.zh: 上面写了这里不允许做什么

translation.en: What we have here is just respect. Respect.
translation.zh: 我们在这里只有尊重

translation.en: Respect whatever rights they have, and they'll respect us, so...
translation.zh: 尊重他们的权利 他们也会尊重我们

translation.en: [mutters] That's the way you have to do it.
translation.zh: 必须要这样才行

translation.en: [Manansala] We have some help from the inmates inside.
translation.zh: 我们会得到狱友的一些帮助

translation.en: [Toral] In our jail, we have 119 cells, right? So...
translation.zh: 在我们监狱 有119个牢房 对吧？

translation.en: each cell has a mayor.
translation.zh: 每个牢房都有一个组长

translation.en: -[in Cebuano] Fellow inmates! -[women] Thank you, ma'am/sir!
translation.zh: -狱友们！ -谢谢你 女士及先生

translation.en: -[cat meows] -[Asingua] In every cell,
translation.zh: 每个牢房里 组长会管理

translation.en: [in Tagalog] the mayor disciplines their own people.
translation.zh: 每个牢房里 组长会管理 他们自己的人

translation.en: She imposes the punishment.
translation.zh: 她会实施惩罚

translation.en: It surprises me too, that they obey when we are all the same.
translation.zh: 我也感到惊讶 她们会服从 虽然我们都是一样的

translation.en: [Maloloyon, in English] This is a jail. You're not a free person in here.
translation.zh: 这里是监狱 你没有自由

translation.en: You have, uh, rules to follow.
translation.zh: 你要遵从规矩

translation.en: If you will not follow the rules, you will be punished.
translation.zh: 如果不守规矩 就会被惩罚

translation.en: They're afraid of paddle, so that's why...
translation.zh: 他们害怕仗板 所以…

translation.en: keep understanding each other. [laughs]
translation.zh: 要不断理解对方

translation.en: [Maloloyon] The paddle is very, very big help to this prison...
translation.zh: 仗板对这个监狱的帮助很大

translation.en: and very, very hard.
translation.zh: 这个惩罚很重

translation.en: -Boom! -[thuds]
translation.zh: （宿务省劳教看守所最后的选择）

translation.en: This is song is dedicated to all my friend.
translation.zh: 这首歌献给我所有的朋友们

translation.en: "Inday." This is song is "Inday."
translation.zh: 这首歌叫做《我将》

translation.en: [Asingua] I met my...
translation.zh: 我遇到了…

translation.en: I met my husband-- [laughing] I can't do it.
translation.zh: 我遇到了丈夫… 我说不出来

translation.en: I met my love in jail.
translation.zh: 我在监狱遇到了我的爱

translation.en: Mr. Lito Granada.
translation.zh: 利托冠纳达先生

translation.en: And I am proud to-- to say-- to say this,
translation.zh: 我很自豪地说 虽然他没有钱

translation.en: that even though he don't have money or he don't have...
translation.zh: 虽然他没有钱 或者也没有…

translation.en: uh, good-looking, but...
translation.zh: 帅气的长相 但是

translation.en: -he has a good heart. -[romantic guitar music playing]
translation.zh: 他有一颗善心

translation.en: [Asingua] That's why I love him, and I'm proud of him.
translation.zh: 所以我爱他 我为他骄傲

translation.en: But in our relationship, I am the bosyo.
translation.zh: 但在我们的关系中 我才是“波西奥”

translation.en: If I told you, "Sit," sit there. [laughs]
translation.zh: 如果我让你坐下来 你就坐下

translation.en: That's the Filipina woman. They're strong! Ooh.
translation.zh: 菲律宾女人就是这样强悍

translation.en: You-- You must afraid the Filipina woman if in love with you,
translation.zh: 如果菲律宾女人爱上了你 你肯定害怕

translation.en: because they will...
translation.zh: 因为她们会…

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Ah, yeah. He-- Her-- Her--
translation.zh: 啊 是的 他的女朋友把耳环给了我 是澳门来的

translation.en: I mean, his girlfriend gave my earrings. From Macau.
translation.zh: 他的女朋友把耳环给了我 是澳门来的

translation.en: So, my name is Jeffon Cuyos Judaya. I live in Tayud, Consolacion, Cebu.
translation.zh: 我叫杰芳库尤斯朱达亚 我住在宿务的康索拉雄市

translation.en: I work in a call center for nine years, in eight different call centers,
translation.zh: 我在八个不同的客服中心工作了九年

translation.en: and I studied veterinarian for five years.
translation.zh: 我学兽医学了五年

translation.en: My arresting officer, he placed one pack of meth on me.
translation.zh: 逮捕我的警官 他把冰毒放在我身上

translation.en: Very small.
translation.zh: 很小一包

translation.en: That's why I was here.
translation.zh: 所以我被关了

translation.en: -I'm sorry. [laughing] -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: In my first week here, I was really shocked
translation.zh: 我来这里第一周时很震惊

translation.en: because most of the guards are not after their salary.
translation.zh: 因为大部分警卫并不是为了工资工作

translation.en: They're paid minimum.
translation.zh: 他们的工资很少

translation.en: And then, they get big pays from getting in the illegal things.
translation.zh: 然后 他们会靠带入非法物品而挣钱

translation.en: So if you want illegal things to get inside,
translation.zh: 所以如果你想要非法物品

translation.en: y-you need to go to the guards.
translation.zh: 你就要去找警卫

translation.en: I said, "Oh, my God. What a government." [scoffs]
translation.zh: 我说：“天呐 真是个好政府”

translation.en: [in Cebuano] Drug-free or no drugs
translation.zh: 宿务省劳教看守所

translation.en: inside the Cebu Provincial Detention and Rehabilitation Center, CPDRC?
translation.zh: 里面是否有毒品？

translation.en: [in English] The proliferation of drugs still exists inside the jail.
translation.zh: 监狱中的毒品交易 依然存在

translation.en: And it's a connivance between some moneyed inmates,
translation.zh: 一些有钱的狱友 监狱警卫和官员

translation.en: jail guards, and jail officers.
translation.zh: 纵容这种行为

translation.en: The main, um, objective of media
translation.zh: 媒体的首要目标

translation.en: is, first, is to inform the public, educate, and entertain...
translation.zh: 是要告知公众 教育、娱乐公众

translation.en: and expose these shenanigans in the government.
translation.zh: 揭发政府的这些行为

translation.en: -[static crackles on radio] -Guardhouse, come in.
translation.zh: 警卫部 进来

translation.en: -[guard on radio, in Cebuano] What is it? -Are they there?
translation.zh: -怎么了 长官？ -他们到了吗？

translation.en: -They're here, sir. -Okay.
translation.zh: 他们到了 长官 好的

translation.en: The media will be here. They're from, um, Channel Three.
translation.zh: 媒体会来这里 他们是第三频道的

translation.en: Uh, they wanna see how we do things.
translation.zh: 他们想看看我们的运行

translation.en: The CPDRC, it's-- it's known for Dancing Inmates,
translation.zh: 宿务省劳教看守所因跳舞狱友知名

translation.en: but it's also known for a source of drugs.
translation.zh: 也因毒品而知名

translation.en: The media, they're attacking me like,
translation.zh: 媒体总会攻击我说

translation.en: "What are you doing about it?" You know, like...
translation.zh: “你采取了什么措施？”之类的

translation.en: They don't know what I'm doing, so... I'll show it all to them.
translation.zh: 他们不知道我的工作内容 所以我就展示给他们看

translation.en: [Castañares, in Cebuano] You guys check here.
translation.zh: 你们来检查那边

translation.en: Just stay over there.
translation.zh: 待在那边

translation.en: [man over PA] Designates, help us out here.
translation.zh: 指派员 帮帮我们

translation.en: [guard] Open your mouth, dude.
translation.zh: 张开你的嘴

translation.en: There are reports of alleged illegal activities,
translation.zh: 有报道说这里有非法活动

translation.en: like using drugs. Like that stuff. So we went in.
translation.zh: 比如使用毒品之类的 所以我们检查

translation.en: And then this is what we got after we searched the cell.
translation.zh: 在搜查后 我们找到了这些

translation.en: Tarantula. Two tarantulas.
translation.zh: 狼蛛 两只狼蛛

translation.en: And assorted cell phones.
translation.zh: 还有各种手机

translation.en: -[reporter] No drugs, no paraphernalia? -[Toral] No paraphernalia.
translation.zh: 但没有毒品 没有相关设备？ 没有毒品设备

translation.en: Yes, that is what we are striving for: a drug-free CPDRC.
translation.zh: 这就是我们的目标 让宿务省劳教看守所没有毒品

translation.en: [Rosales, in English] Yeah, now Sir Marco is very controversial now.
translation.zh: 现在马科先生很有争议

translation.en: Some media love-- love to make some issues.
translation.zh: 有些媒体总是制造事端

translation.en: Then it hurts because, uh, Sir Marco is a good guy.
translation.zh: 这很不好 因为马科先生是好人

translation.en: [in Cebuano] Thank you, miss.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 小姐

translation.en: -[in English] Thank you. Bye. -[Toral] Bye-bye!
translation.zh: -谢谢 再见 -再见

translation.en: -[woman] Bye-bye, sir! -[Toral] Bye. Bye.
translation.zh: -再见 先生 -再见

translation.en: They're all my friends.
translation.zh: 他们都是我的朋友

translation.en: Media.
translation.zh: 媒体

translation.en: Yeah. What?
translation.zh: 是的 怎么？

translation.en: Yeah. At least they saw what we got, you know?
translation.zh: 是 至少他们亲眼看到了 对吗？

translation.en: But they didn't see any drugs, 'cause there's none.
translation.zh: 但他们看不到毒品 因为根本没有

translation.en: Long day... today.
translation.zh: 今天是很漫长的一天

translation.en: [Maloloyon] When we in here in jail, it's so hard.
translation.zh: 我们在监狱里过得很难

translation.en: [Maloloyon] The night is just the worst part.
translation.zh: 夜晚是最艰难的

translation.en: At night, if it's getting dark and we are in our cell...
translation.zh: 晚上如果天黑了 我们在牢房里

translation.en: we all think we are prisoners.
translation.zh: 我们都认为自己的牢犯

translation.en: [in Tagalog] I have already accepted that I am here.
translation.zh: 我已经接受了自己身在何处 （马龙马罗永 狱友）

translation.en: Nothing. We can do nothing anymore.
translation.zh: 我们什么也做不了

translation.en: I thought, "What happens if I die?"
translation.zh: 我想：“如果我死了怎么办？”

translation.en: So I made my decision and said...
translation.zh: 于是我做出决定 说

translation.en: "Lord, you take charge of me.
translation.zh: “上帝 我把自己交给你

translation.en: -[inmates chanting] -[Maloloyon] Give me hope."
translation.zh: 给予我希望吧”

translation.en: [Montemayor] You know, sometimes... at night,
translation.zh: 有时候 在晚上

translation.en: I'm thinking about my-- my situation here.
translation.zh: 我会思考自己的处境

translation.en: And, uh, it boils down to one.
translation.zh: 最终的结论只有一个

translation.en: This is my home.
translation.zh: 这里是我的家

translation.en: Every one of us got a choice, you know? But I choose to... to be like this.
translation.zh: 我们每个人都有选择 对吗？ 但我选择这样

translation.en: But I'm not-- I don't regret.
translation.zh: 我并不后悔

translation.en: Would I do it again?
translation.zh: 我还会重蹈覆辙吗？

translation.en: Of course I would, because I enjoyed it. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我当然会 因为我喜欢这样

translation.en: In fact, I'm happy I'm here
translation.zh: 实际上 我在这里很开心

translation.en: because if not, I could have been dead by now.
translation.zh: 因为如果不是这里 我现在已经死了

translation.en: [Toral] I love my job, you know? I love helping the in-inmates.
translation.zh: 我爱自己的工作 我喜欢帮助狱友

translation.en: Yeah, I'm not scared of them, because I know how they, you know,
translation.zh: 我不害怕他们 因为我知道他们的想法

translation.en: how they think, how they feel. Yeah.
translation.zh: 他们的感受

translation.en: -Because, you know, I've been there. -[child giggling]
translation.zh: 因为我也经历过

translation.en: I was one of them.
translation.zh: 我是他们的一员

translation.en: I learned a lot of things when I was in jail.
translation.zh: 我在监狱里学到了很多东西

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 然后…

translation.en: So I know there's a brewing, big conflict inside CPDRC.
translation.zh: 所以我知道这里酝酿着很大的冲突

translation.en: -[inmate 1] All brown out. -[inmate 2] Huh?
translation.zh: -停电了 -嗯？

translation.en: -[inmate 1] All brown out. -[inmate 2] All of it?
translation.zh: -全部停电了 -全部？

translation.en: [Toral] Things happening in jail does not happen every day outside.
translation.zh: 监狱里发生的事情 并不会在监狱外每天发生

translation.en: A lot of crazy things happen there,
translation.zh: 这里发生很多疯狂的事情

translation.en: like somebody gets killed, somebody commits suicide.
translation.zh: 比如有人被杀 有人自杀

translation.en: [Toral] By heart, I know that because I've been there.
translation.zh: 我知道 因为我经历过

translation.en: I was, like, down.
translation.zh: 我很低沉

translation.en: You know, rock bottom, really.
translation.zh: 真的跌入低谷

translation.en: And now I'm back.
translation.zh: 现在我回来了

translation.en: -Like Arnold Schwarzenegger, "I'm back." -[switches click]
translation.zh: 就像施瓦辛格那样 “我回来了”

translation.en: And a favorite quote of mine--
translation.zh: 我最爱的一句话是

translation.en: "Throw me to the wolves, and I come back leader of the pack."
translation.zh: “把我扔进狼群 我会成为狼群的首领”

translation.en: So as long as I'm there...
translation.zh: 所以只要我在这里

translation.en: all our inmate are happy.
translation.zh: 所有的狱友都满意

translation.en: Like, if they put somebody else,
translation.zh: 如果他们用其他人

translation.en: somebody didn't come from jail,
translation.zh: 那些没入狱过的人来管理

translation.en: there gonna be a big problem, real big problem.
translation.zh: 他们会遇到大问题 很大的问题
